description: A policy executed against an attestation or material

^(policy_reference)$.description: Group this evaluated policy belongs to, if any

^(reference_digest)$.description:
fully qualified reference to the policy
 i.e
 http://my-domain.com/foo.yaml
 file://foo.yaml
 chainloop://my-provider.com/foo@sha256:1234
 NOTE: embedded policies will not have a reference
 Deprecated: use policy_reference instead

^(skip_reasons)$.description: Evaluation messages, intended to communicate evaluation errors (invalid input)

body.description: the body of the policy. This field will be empty if there is a FQDN reference to the policy

name.description: The policy name from the policy spec

policyReference.description: Group this evaluated policy belongs to, if any

referenceDigest.description:
fully qualified reference to the policy
 i.e
 http://my-domain.com/foo.yaml
 file://foo.yaml
 chainloop://my-provider.com/foo@sha256:1234
 NOTE: embedded policies will not have a reference
 Deprecated: use policy_reference instead

requirements.description: List of requirements this policy contributes to satisfy

skipReasons.description: Evaluation messages, intended to communicate evaluation errors (invalid input)

skipped.description: whether this evaluation was skipped or not (because of an invalid input, for example)

sources.description: Base64 representation of run scripts. It might be empty if there is a FQDN reference to the policy

type.description: material type, if any, of the evaluated policy

with.description: arguments, as they come from the policy attachment

title: Policy Evaluation
